description: vol. 1 (ṭahārah through ḥajj; lacuna after fol. 1). ff. 155. 240 x 164; 155 x 115 mm. 20 lin. 13th/14th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, I, 542 (no. 49); S I, 752; Bouyges, Essai de chronologie des œuvres de al-Ghazali, no. 4. Incip.: ... اما بعد حمد الله الذى هو فاتحة کل کتاب وخاتمة کل خطاب .. فانى رأىت الهمم فى طلب العلوم قاصرة
author: Ghazzālī, 1058-1111
creator: Ghazzālī, 1058-1111
subject: Islamic law—Early works to 1800
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
